newsitem.title: POLAND: Optimus surges on Microsoft deal.
newsitem.headline: Optimus surges on Microsoft deal.

text.p: Polish computer maker Optimus SA surged 10 percent to 126.5 zlotys in active trade on speculation on the nature of cooperation between the firm and Microsoft Corp, traders said.

At a Tuesday news conference the two firms signed a deal to market and sell under a joint brand a new computer equipped with Microsoft business software, though some players may have expected Microsoft to take an Optimus stake, traders said.

"Maybe some people thought that and bought today....(Tuesday's) information isn't the kind to push the price upwards but the overall market seems strong so Optimus doesn't necessarily have to fall," one trader said.
